cause.description:
I want to gather as many nationalities as possible to discuss politics in their countries, racism, peoples misconceptions, where u find the most beautiful women, cultural differenses, the most beautiful places in the world, and what we can do to make the world a better place, and everyone can feel free to start there own topic!
There is a Group named the same if u search on gruoups, i created that group before i knew about "causes" so join both of them!!!
Andreas from Sweden
1. Culture
2. equality
3. politics
4. rasism
5. integration/segregation
6. travel
cause.mission: share culture, religion and places to visit and policis and so on...
cause.name: Faces From different Places
